A: 1. "MY MOUTH" is called what in French? (a) Mon next (b) Ma bouche (c) Ma tète
2. How do you say "MY NOSE" in French? (a) Mon nex (b) Mon nez (c) Mon cou
3. What is "MY EYEBROW" in French? (a) Mon oeil (b) Mon front (c) Mon sourcil
4. "Mon cou" translates to what in English? (a) My mouth (b) My chin (c) My neck
5. What does "Mon menton" mean in English? (a) My mouth (b) My leg (c) My chin
6. How do you say "MY HAIR" in French? (a) Mes cheveux (b) Ma tète (c) Mon front
7. What is "FRIDAY" in French? (a) Lundi (b) Mecredi (c) Vendredi
8. How do you say "MY FOREHEAD" in French? (a) Mon sourcil (b) Mon front (c) Mon cou
9. Bon après midi means _ (a) Good morning (b) Good afternoon (c) Good evening
10. "We are delighted to see you" is _ in French (a) Nous sommes enchantés de Vous voir (b) Je suis occupé maintenant (c) Je suis ravi de te voir
11. "ENVIE" means _ in French (a) Happy (b) Desire (c) Appreciation
12. What does "TRE BIEN DORMIE?" mean? (a) Good to see you (b) Hope you're doing well (c) Did you sleep well?
13. What does "BONJOUR PROFESSEUR" mean? (a) Good morning friends (b) Good morning teachers (c) Good morning Madam
14. "BONJOUR MONSIEUR" means _? (a) Good afternoon Sir! (b) Good evening Sir! (c) Good morning Sir!
15. "ÀU REVOIR LA CLASSE" means _ (a) Good evening class (b) Good night class (c) Good bye class
16. How do you say "I am delighted to see you" in French? (a) Nous sommes enchantés de te voir (b) Nous sommes enchantés de vous voir (c) Je suis ravi de te voir
17. Levez-vous la classe means _ (a) Class greet (b) Class stand (c) Class sit
18. Merci beaucoup means _ (a) Thank you very much (b) Welcome (c) Good night
19. Àu revoir Monsieur means _ (a) Thank you very much Sir (b) Good morning Sir (c) Good bye Sir
20. Bonjour mes amies means _ (a) Good morning children (b) Good morning teachers (c) Good morning friends
21. What does "Donc aide-moi Dieu" mean? (a) So help me God (b) Trust and obey (c) I am a Nigerian
22. "Le Nigeria ne te saluons" means _ (a) I love Nigeria (b) I am a Nigerian (c) Nigeria we hail thee
23. "Notra drapeau sera symbole" means _ (a) I can't see the symbol (b) Our flag shall be a symbol (c) I want to draw a symbol
24. What is "Comme-ci comme-ca" in English? (a) Like this like that (b) Like that like this (c) Like this like this
25. "Good morning friends" in French is _ (a) Bonjour petit (b) Bonjour mes Amie's (c) Bonjour monsieur
26. How do you say "Did you sleep well" in French? (a) Tre Bien dormie? (b) Comment çava? (c) Comment se àpassé ke travail?
27. What is "Ferme ta bouche" in English? (a) Close your mouth (b) Open your mouth (c) Clear the bush
28. "Repetez encore" means _ (a) Repeat after me (b) Repeat it again (c) Stand still
29. "Oh Dieu de la création" means _ in English (a) Nigeria is a great nation (b) Oh God of all creation (c) We are His creation
30. What does comment tu t'apelle? mean in English? (a) What is her name? (b) What is his name? (c) What is your name?
31. What does the sentence "Donc aide moi Dieu" mean? (a) Praise the Lord (b) To God be the glory (c) So help me God
